pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference in the Balanced One-Way ANOVA Model with Random Factor // Provides functions to perform statistical inference in the balanced one-way ANOVA model with a random factor: confidence intervals, prediction interval, and Weerahandi generalized pivotal quantities. References: Burdick Graybill (1992, ISBN-13: 978-0824786441); Weerahandi (1995) doi:10.1007/978-1-4612-0825-9; Lin Liao (2008) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2008.01.001.
